ToLower(Glyph)

Converts the value of a UNICODE grapheme cluster to its lowercase equivalent, invariant of orthography.

Declaration
public static Glyph ToLower(this Glyph glyph)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Glyph glyph

The UNICODE grapheme cluster to convert.
Returns
Type Description
Glyph

The lowercase equivalent of glyph, or the unchanged value of glyph if glyph is already lowercase, has no lowercase equivalent, or is not alphabetic.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ToLower(Glyph, Orthography)

Converts the value of a UNICODE grapheme cluster to its lowercase equivalent, using the casing rules of the specified orthography.

Declaration
public static Glyph ToLower(this Glyph glyph, Orthography orthography)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Glyph glyph

The UNICODE grapheme cluster to convert.
Orthography orthography

The Orthography instance describing the rules of the orthography.
Returns
Type Description
Glyph

The lowercase equivalent of glyph, or the unchanged value of glyph if glyph is already lowercase, has no lowercase equivalent, or is not alphabetic.
Remarks

If orthography is null, then the invariant should be used.
